name: Mirrored Dreams
description:
Mirror Dreams was developed for the Global Game Jam 2022! :)

It's a 2.5D side-scroller puzzle game where you explore a child's dreams and help him solve some puzzles within his imagination. Here anything is possible, from a world made entirely of sweets, to a room full of toys, or even an expedition to the desert. 

Accompanying the boy in a symmetrical world is his imaginary friend. They share an amazing bond, that unites them, they depend on each other to reach the end of the dreams. Your task is to move pieces of the environment to help guide them towards the goal. 

Are you ready to dream and help this duo?
